website_summaries.verdict: This manual egg beater employs two rotating beaters to mix your ingredients twice as fast as a traditional whisk.
pros: Ergonomic handle with a non-slip grip
Support arm enables beaters to spin freely while it rests on the bottom of the bowl
Mixes products more quickly than a traditional whisk
cons: It doesn't work as well in very thick batters and it may take a little more effort to turn

customer_reviews.title: Seems to whip fine but it’s Not for Senior citizens
customer_reviews.text: Updating our initial review. After struggling with this 3 or 4 times we’ve decided that it’s not for us. Too hard to hold and too hard to turn. Probably fine for the younger generation but we’re going back to our old mixer. It’s not very easy to hold and it’s hard to take apart for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jack98110

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty enough to beat eggs if you have more than 3 or 4
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an age-old egg-beater of which the casting had finally given out on the handle. Probably 40 years old used weekly at a minimum. This device, while seemingly really efficient, does not seem to have internals which are going to hold up. When I try to beat a dozen eggs or so, I can hear and feel slippage in the internal gears, The viscosity seems to overwhelm the beater. Chose this one on reviews, and the fact that all the beaters of similar design to my old one have horrible reviews. Can't anyone make a decent egg beater any more?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nebergall

customer_reviews.title: This is for light stuff like eggs only.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to make mushed potatoes with this mixer, it started skidding gears. And I have mushed potatoes before using this mixer, just wanted to make it more creamy. So for 20 buck I'd rather buy multipurpose electrical mixer. BTW this mechanical mixer is kinda noisy also.
customer_reviews.author: Serg

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase item again.
customer_reviews.text: The item worked well for 7 months, but today, 12/2/2019, one of the beater supports detached from the base and the item is no longer useable. There appears to be no way to successfully repair it. Unfortunately, the item is beyond Amazon's time limit for return, although there is a 5-year guarantee in the description of the item. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: PGNC

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but a little difficult to remove parts to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is okay but I found it hard to take apart to clean and a little to hard to whisk with.
customer_reviews.author: lily42

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of cleaning it and it's ergonomically designed. The plastic body feels a little too brittle for the torque that it will be under. For light-duty mixing it's great but once a few chocolate chips go in, it's a workout that I'm not sure the whisk can handle. Redesign the body to be more robust and it's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Egg Beater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great egg beater. The action is smooth and everything is sealed so it's much easier to keep clean than my last one. This is a definite keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: this whisk is really easy to hold and use. The blades and the protector pop right out for easy cleaning in the dishwasher. I'm not sure how I would clean the gears if any food ever got up in there, though. The only thing I would say is that this is probably not for super heavy duty use. I use it for things like eggs or blending fruit into yogurt. for something heavier like cake batter, you probably will want to use an electric mixer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Askov

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do but I wish I could find one of the old style with the flat wire on the bottom rather than the round wire this one has.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great looking....
customer_reviews.text: Liked the slim line. Yet found it a wobbly hold at best! Preferred the angled old fashioned grip. The slim line also hides what might lurk inside after a trip to the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: OmaHLZ

customer_reviews.title: Seems To Be Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Larger than you might think. Seems to be a quality product, I've only used it twice so far. I like the bar across the bottom that keeps the "beaters" off the bowl. Happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: Made well and works fine
customer_reviews.text: I don't like having to take it apart to clean and wish it could be clamped onto the side of a bowl when I got to get an ingredient to add to a mixture but I'm very glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: regina hageman

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE AND CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity and quickness for whipping up a great omelet.
customer_reviews.author: Stevan Andersen

customer_reviews.title: ZYLISS Quick Whisk Double Rotation Kitchen Hand Whisk - Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: i got this whisk specifically to use for scrambled eggs and omelettes. it is FABULOUS for beating eggs - especially for making a light, fluffy, no-yolk omelette. i have NOT tried using it for anything other than.... eggs. it's easy to use - light weight yet sturdy. it's easy to clean - just pop out the beaters and center bar and stick them into the silverware rack in the dishwasher. hand wash the body. it's easy to hang up - turn upside down and hang by center bar on a hook on my pan rack. i love being able to just grab this and make some eggs - no hassle. very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kre8iv1

customer_reviews.title: Love these for my scrambled eggs!
customer_reviews.text: This whisk works perfectly for my morning, scrambled eggs. I am able to whip the perfect amount of air into my eggs, without having to dig out my electric beaters. The beaters on this whisk easily remove, so that you can wash them. This works perfectly for gravy as well. I like the guard that is located below the beaters. This allows you to rest them in a bowl, and turn the knob, without having them slip all over the bowl. I am impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Quality made mixing option.
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy for quick whisks. Sometimes I don't want to get out the electric hand mixer so this is really good for small jobs, like for my pancake mixes. The only thing that bothers me about this is the beaters can get stuck together. Other than that I found this useful, plus, the ergonomic design makes it feel good in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mick McArt

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned beater
customer_reviews.text: For those of us that remember beaters you hand rotated this has a modern turn in an upright handle. It beats more thoroughly than a hand whisk and quicker. It also brings back memories as I have my grandson try it when we are cooking, explaining this is how it was before everyone had electric mixers, but at least the beaters are dishwasher safe. However it is very difficult use on thick batters, the beaters themselves are of thinner composition than most electric mixers.
customer_reviews.author: wogan

customer_reviews.title: Very Little Effort
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these when I was a kid and used to help my om cook and I always liked how well it mixed for me. I like this one even better than the one I used to have. It takes very little effort and it whisks much better than just a hand whisk. With both mixers turning with strength, you food gets mixed more quickly and without stressing your hand. I like the length on these and they it's not to wide. It's just easy to use and works well.
customer_reviews.author: RETSmile

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This quick whisk is a great compromise between traditional whisks and hand mixers, which have always frustrated me by not having a low enough setting for spray-prone foods. It's comfortable to use and can be used at slow or pretty high speeds. This is a great addition to any kitchen and will, in some cases, even replace my stand mixer for small tasks I couldn't do without it before.
customer_reviews.author: eaAK

customer_reviews.title: It's a manual egg beater
customer_reviews.text: This manual egg beater, for that is what it is, is OK, but I still prefer my balloon whisk for beating eggs. I can get more air into my egg whites , increasing their volume, by the old fashioned method. And, for regular beating, I prefer plugging in my electric Braun as it's faster.
customer_reviews.author: asiana

product_meta.title: ZYLISS Quick Whisk - Removable Double Rotation Kitchen Hand Whisk, White
product_meta.description: The Zyliss quick whisk is designed with unique double rotating stainless steel beaters, that rotate simultaneously around two axes to whisk twice as fast. The ergonomic handle and contours of the handle fit perfectly in the palm and the textured soft grip provides controlled handling, even when hands are wet. The quick whisk provides support and balance when whisking, especially when undertaking more difficult tasks such as blending batter. When you're finished the whisks and support bar easily come apart and are dishwasher safe for quick clean up. Focusing on functionality, design, cleanliness and safety, Zyliss has relied upon a heritage of excellence that began in Switzerland over 60 years ago. Building on this time-held tradition, the company has advanced to produce and distribute kitchen equipment that is world-renowned. Zyliss has pioneered the design of more than 200 kitchen essentials, with quality and engineering that cannot be duplicated.
feature_bullets: Double rotating beaters whip cream twice as fast as competing products
Support arm on bottom rests in bowl allowing beaters to spin freely
Ergonomic handle is soft to the touch and eases hand pressure
Beaters easily remove for quick cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars42 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
